# Yutori Labs

> Sensor-connected sauna and cold plunge hardware with an app that tracks temperature, HRV, and session history automatically.

Yutori builds thermal wellness hardware (saunas, cold plunge tubs) paired with Bluetooth sensors and a mobile app. The sensors stream ambient temperature, session start/end, and duration to the Yutori app in real time. The app records session history, heart rate, HRV, and provides AI-powered insights.

## Products

- Saunas with embedded temperature sensors
- Chiller-powered cold plunge tubs
- RuuviTag Bluetooth sensors for retrofit installations

## App Features

- Live session temperature graphs
- Heart rate and HRV tracking via Apple Health / Health Connect
- Session history with duration, peak temperature, and calorie estimates
- AI coaching insights after each session
- Safety alerts and emergency escalation
